org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.title: SapMachine #1124: Vitals: Add Container information
org.jenkinsci.plugins.github.pullrequest.body:
This patch adds cgroup information to the SapMachine Vitals.
We now print limits (memory, mem+swap, kernel mem) and usage (user space, kernel usage).
Looks like this (in this example, docker was run with -m 8G, and it establishes a memory limit of 8g and - apparently - a mem+swap limit of 16g):
``` cgroup-lim: cgroup memory limit cgroup-limsw: cgroup memory+swap limit cgroup-slim: cgroup memory soft limit cgroup-usg: cgroup memory usage cgroup-usgsw: cgroup memory+swap usage cgroup-kusg: cgroup kernel memory usage ```
``` ------------cgroup------------ lim limsw slim usg usgsw kusg 8.0g 16.0g 67m 67m 2m 8.0g 16.0g 67m 67m 2m 8.0g 16.0g 32m 32m 2m 8.0g 16.0g 19m 19m 2m ```
Patch notes:
- we almost always print out this information. Only if the VM runs inside a root memory controller (which cannot be limited) we omit the information since it would be mostly redundant with whatever is in /proc/meminfo. Note that for now I also print out cgroup information when running in a systemd mem controller; we may skip the information in the future when running in systemd. - in the legend, we now point out `[*]` values that are host specific - patch contains a large test addition to test the new feature.
fixes #1124
